page.title: 14Pendomer: Schools
page.content: The only school in the block is Halstock Primary, whose roll is currently 15. The main building is Victorian, there is also a hut and an asphalt playground, and a good playing field nearby. Some years ago an application for planning consent to erect some 10 houses near the school aimed at "first time buyers" was frustrated by local opposition; now that there is a real risk of the school closing through lack of young families in the village, raising doubts about future arrangements for the groups that meet in the school, people are having second thoughts and it seems that the proposal for houses may be revived. Older Halstock children go by bus to secondary school in Beaminster; there are sometimes problems when those over 16 want to go on to Yeovil College in Somerset.
